A couple of cool ideas for the WBC 50 Hikes Challenge.

### 1. Apple Guides (First concept for WBC 50)

From the Apple support page on how to use Guides:

> *Explore new places with Guides in Maps on iPhone.  Guides from trusted brands and partners are available in the Maps app*

> *In the Maps app <img src="https://help.apple.com/assets/5FD260DB680CE26D5580207C/5FD260DF680CE26D558020B0/en_US/089762aa58157ec3e9bdd4e42a6c3424.png" alt="" height="20" width="20">, you can organize places into your own guides.  Add a place to your Guides on your iPhone: Tap “Save to,” then choose one of your guides.*

* Works great to validate.  Doesn't have to be the final map, but it gets us 95% of the way there
* [Apple Guides](https://guides.apple.com/?){: target="_blank"}
  * Sat May 22 17:03:17 PDT 2021
  * NCG 50 for 50 Hike Challenge.
  * Apple Guides now shows 38/50.  But all 50 are there.  :( .  It may not be ready for prime time.


---

### 2. Links to Apple Maps & Google Maps.

* Works good for iOS when hiker is using either Apple or Google maps
* Works good for Android hikers

{% endfor %}
</ul>
